Text:
Thanks! Interesting topic, excellent quality.

(Just one little note for the future. When the original recording is mono, as it is here, you might wish to consider encoding it in Mono, 64k, instead of Joint Stereo, 128k. The quality would be precisely the same, for ~2/3 of the disk space & bandwidth.)

re mono recording - 

I would, but I also up on a private site that requires fairly Nazi standards. I just dump 'em here when they've been upped there. I'm too lazy to rip shit twice.
